\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.behaviour.strict}
\label{configuration:DatabaseBehaviourStrict}
\ClearAPI
Whether to use strict behavior for database connections. During strict mode invalid rows added to the database will not be adjusted. Valid values are "true" and "false".

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.jdbc.config.PersistenceJdbcConfigurationConstants.DatabaseBehaviourStrict}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.behaviour.strict}}]
database.behaviour.strict=false
\end{lstlisting}
